title: WPP buys Thailand's nudeJEH for undislcosed sum
content:
LONDON (ShareCast) - (ShareCast News) - WPP   (LSE: WPP.L - news ) said it has agreed to buy Thai advertising agency nudeJEH for an undisclosed sum.
The takeover will be made through WPP unit Grey Group. The merged firm will be GREYnJ United, the advertising giant said in a statement. 

Founded in 2011 through the merger of Nude Communication and JEH United, nudeJEH provides creative, branding, strategy consultation, web design and production services. The company also owns digital agency Nine Dotz. 

Combined revenues for nudeJEH and Nine Dotz for 2014 were 239m baht with gross assets of 123m baht. 

Its key clients include Ananda Development, Bangkok Airways, Bangkok Dusit Medical Services, Bio Consumer, Tesco Lotus and Puriku.
